command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$body.identity.userAssigned" options="mi-user-assigned user-assigned" group="Identity">
<help short="Dictionary of "/>

help.short: Settings for the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF)
The activation state of the WAF. Use 'Enabled' to enable the WAF and 'Disabled' to disable it.
The preferred support contact email address of the user used for sending alerts and notification. Can be an empty string or a valid email address.
The name of targeted NGINX deployment
Settings for the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF)
The activation state of the WAF. Use 'Enabled' to enable the WAF and 'Disabled' to disable it.

argGroup.name: Properties

<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$body.properties.networkProfile.frontEndIPConfiguration.publicIPAddresses" options="public-ip-addresses">
